ygData.subject: Re: Spell locations *SPOILER*
ygData.msgSnippet: I just bought Pillar of Fire and Titans Clash and a few others for a friend of mine.  Lvl 16+ spells are NOT research only.  The only spell I am having
ygData.messageBody:
I just bought Pillar of Fire and Titans Clash and a few others for a
friend of mine. Lvl 16+ spells are NOT research only. The only spell I am
having problems finding now is just Identify. If anyone knows where this
spell is please let me know.

-----Original Message-----
From: Jonathan O. Yantis, Ph.D. [mailto:yantis@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 05, 1999 10:00 AM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Spell locations *SPOILER*


From: "Jonathan O. Yantis, Ph.D." <yantis@...>

This message is not true.. i spent 4 hours going thru this place looking
for missing level 16 and 20 spells.. they were not there.

Deklar Level 25 wizard Karana


At 08:12 AM 5/4/99 +0000, you wrote:
>From: "Rotas Koth" <rotaskoth@...>
>
>>From: "aweber" <aweber@...>
>>Pillar of Fire is a research only spell.
>I wish it were, but it isent. IMHO _ALL_ spells beyond level 12 should be
>research only. Of course they should make it a bit more easy to get the
>runes then. They are loaded WAY to seldom, but I hear that they are going
to
>fix that :).
>
>*SPOILER starts here*
>
>All wizard spells up to and including level 20 can be found somewhere in
>erudin. If you cant find it in the wizard guild or the palace or the
library
>try looking in the temples around the palace and other places inside the
>erudin city.
>I have also seen ALL our DD spells up to and including level 44 in Erudin
>and most of our AE spells up to and including level 49 (some in between
>where missing i think ... i just briefly looked at them since i couldnt
>afford them anyway ... but the level 49 AE spell was there).
>
>*SPOILER end*
>
>Well i hope this helps people who want to be helped and that Verant soon
>will remove these spells and make them research only (if they load more
>runes).
>
>Rotas Koth, Innoruuk.
>
>
